headline: Duke Energy announces dividend payments to shareholders
summary: Duke Energy (NYSE: DUK) today declared a quarterly cash dividend on its common stock of $1.045 per share. This dividend is payable on March 17, 2025, to shareholders of record at the close of business on Feb. 14, 2025.
